name: Ultimate Product Gallery for WooCommerce
author: Barfaraz

sections.description:
Overview

Ultimate Product Gallery for WooCoomerce plugin is allows to see the product images clearly the most, so you easily bring your products closer to customers. So it not only helps improve website usability but also makes your store friendly and more professional!

Frontend demo

Plugin Features

  • Popup lightbox product gallery + zoom mode
  • Single product page image zoom
  • Beautiful scrollbar theme
  • Mobile-friendly
  • Fully customizable
  • Compatible with most themes
  • Very fast and optimized
  • Easy installation

Pro Features

  • YouTube & Vimeo video support
  • Fullscreen image zoom mode in popup lightbox
  • Mouse wheel zooming
  • Add to cart button in popup lightbox
  • 10+ beautiful scrollbar themes
  • RTL support
  • Technical support
  • Free installation(if needed)
  • and…

Purchase Pro version
sections.installation:
Log into Admin area of your WordPress website.
Go to “Plugins” â€”> “Add New”.
Find this plugin and click install.
Activate this plugin through the “Plugins” tab.
sections.faq:
How do I install this plugin?

You can install as others regular wordpress plugin. No different way. Please see on installation tab.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial Release

1.0.1

  • Compatibility with latest WooCommerce version
  • Compatibility with latest WordPress version
